title: What to Do if You Test Positive for Covid-19 as Omicron Variant Surges
sub_head: Whom should you tell, how long should people quarantine, and when should you call your doctor? Here are answers to your questions.
body:
The highly contagious Omicron variant of Covid-19 is spreading widely in the U.S. and more people are testing positive for the virus, including those who have been vaccinated or boosted.
After nearly two years of pandemic, figuring out what youâ€™re supposed to do after receiving a positive test result is still tricky, and varying vaccination status among the population makes the questions more complex.
